::Kitkat/DarkMouse::

KitKat::
She turned and looked at Megatron. She sniffed the air. Rowdy was in 
that thing, somewhere, but he was there.  She transformed into bot 
mode and stood there looking at him. Her big, black, full tail swayed 
gently behind her.  She had her eyes narrowed at him. "Rowdy, I know 
your in there. You have to remember, we are your friends. Please, 
leave the vok and return to us. Don't you remember yourself before 
this happened?"

DarkMouse::
"But I'm still having trouble walking and can't transform yet." she 
gave an agrivated sigh. "Well, how much longer till I'm back to full 
funtioning order?" Then it clicked in her mind what Black Aracnia had 
said,"Me, Powerful? OH that's great, just call me Mighty Mouse from 
now on."
(Sorry, couldn't resist)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron stepped in between Rowdy Wolf and Kitkat. He held both 
his hands 
> up and glared at them both. "Stop this at once! You are to use your 
hatred to 
> defeat the Maximals, not on each other. Not that I wouldnt want to 
see a good 
> fight, but I cant spare troops right now. Yes."
> 
>     Black Aracnia returned to Darkmouse and examined her 
hand. "Well, Liquid 
> Energon is very powerful. You should be thankful, now you can heal 
without a 
> CR chamber. Your very powerful. The shakes will go in time, and you 
shouldnt 
> worry to much about them."
